name: Noca
description:
Noca is the first ever game I made myself.

A couple of weeks ago I decided to learn to code.  I've completed some Unity tutorials, but I don't think this is the best way how to learn something. I decided to make my own game jams.  I'm not good enough to participate in the official ones. I picked a random theme and gave myself 5 days. I plan to do it as often as possible and I hope this will improve my skills. 

A theme for this week: No one can see you

Controls: 
Move: Arrows or WASD
- Visibility switch

- Add some time 

Goal:
You have to collect all coin before time runs out, but you are able to collect them only when you are invisible. Use "visibility switcher" to make you invisible for 5s.  Don't forget that you can also collect some extra time but only when you are visible. 

Have fun.   :)
